title: Font for World Series 2009
content:
Hey Guys:

Wanted to see if anyone could ID the font being used by MLB for the World Series.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20091108153223im_/http:/typophile.com/files/ScreenSnapz_4725.jpg)

Many thanks!

RC
author: arcanegel

comments.content: I cant even seem to find the W anywhere..

It is a weird mash-up of ITC Kabel for WORLD SERIES and Avant Garde for COM  
Also note that all of the angled terminals have be squared.
